ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Selo's Consonant Chain
ygData.msgSnippet: ... To reiterate my perspective from my experience, charisma is far and beyond the most important stat for us.  With cha gear on and lute equipped, I can top
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 19 Apr 2000, Jeff Illian wrote:

> Hehe, where were all you guys last time we went through this thread? I fealt like I was the only bard in
> Norrath who couldn't get chains to work :)

To reiterate my perspective from my experience, charisma is far and beyond
the most important stat for us. With cha gear on and lute equipped, I can
top 168 unbuffed.

On the instrument topic, I didn't notice any advantage to using a flute
(piccalo even) with Bravura. Confirmation on the bonus given for wind
instruments would be nice (beyond the pixie MR reduction), as I am having
a hard time justifying carrying one around (save shauri's requirement).

Athren
